1983.caption: Motorola DynaTAC 8000X - First commercial mobile phone

1984.caption: Apple Macintosh launched with iconic '1984' Super Bowl ad
Ghostbusters blends comedy and supernatural in blockbuster hit
Prince releases influential album and film 'Purple Rain'
Astronaut Bruce McCandless performs first untethered spacewalk
Alexey Pajitnov creates the addictive puzzle game Tetris

1985.caption: Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) released in North America
Mikhail Gorbachev becomes leader of the Soviet Union

1986.caption: Sega Master System released in North America

1987.caption: Guns N' Roses - Appetite for Destruction
The Simpsons first appear as shorts

1988.caption: Pan Am Flight 103 bombed over Lockerbie

1990.caption: MC Hammer - U Can't Touch This
Super Mario Bros. 3 defines NES platforming
David Lynch's Twin Peaks captivates audiences

1991.caption: Super Nintendo (SNES) released in North America
World Wide Web becomes publicly available

1992.caption: MTV's The Real World pioneers reality TV

1993.caption: Jurassic Park brings dinosaurs to life with CGI
The X-Files brings sci-fi investigation to TV

1994.caption: Netscape Navigator dominates early web browsing

1995.caption: Sony PlayStation launched in North America
Toy Story Released (First Feature-Length CGI Film)

1996.caption: Deep Blue defeats Garry Kasparov (first match)

1997.caption: Radiohead releases landmark album OK Computer
South Park pushes boundaries on Comedy Central

1999.caption: The Sopranos launches HBO's prestige drama era
Sega Dreamcast launches in North America

2000.caption: International Space Station (ISS) welcomes first resident crew
First Hybrid Car (Toyota Prius) widely available in US

2001.caption: Microsoft enters console market with Xbox and Halo
Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring released

2002.caption: The Wire offers gritty look at Baltimore

2004.caption: World of Warcraft defines the modern MMO

2005.caption: Angela Merkel becomes Chancellor of Germany

2006.caption: Nintendo Wii released, popularizes motion controls
Pluto demoted to dwarf planet status

2007.caption: First Apple iPhone revolutionizes mobile phones
Global Financial Crisis begins to unfold

2008.caption: First Android phone (T-Mobile G1 / HTC Dream) released
Barack Obama elected first African American US President

2009.caption: Bitcoin network created, genesis block mined

2011.caption: Game of Thrones premieres on HBO

2012.caption: "Gangnam Style" becomes first YouTube video to reach 1 billion views
End of Mayan calendar cycle sparks widespread theories

2014.caption: Ebola virus epidemic in West Africa
ALS Ice Bucket Challenge goes viral
Guardians of the Galaxy film released

2015.caption: Paris Agreement on climate change adopted
Star Wars: The Force Awakens released

2016.caption: Pokémon GO brings AR gaming mainstream
Brexit referendum: UK votes to leave the EU

2017.caption: Great American Eclipse visible across the US

2018.caption: GDPR takes effect in the EU

2019.caption: First image of a black hole unveiled (EHT)

2020.caption: COVID-19 pandemic declared by WHO, global lockdowns begin
George Floyd protests against racial injustice erupt globally
PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S consoles released
SpaceX Crew Dragon Demo-2 launches astronauts to ISS

2021.caption: Suez Canal obstruction by Ever Given
Withdrawal of US troops from Afghanistan
Squid Game becomes Netflix's biggest series launch

2022.caption: ChatGPT launched to the public by OpenAI
NASA's DART mission successfully impacts asteroid Dimorphos

2023.caption: Continued advancements in large language models (LLMs)
Threads (by Meta) launched as Twitter competitor
Significant heatwaves and climate events globally
Barbie and Oppenheimer ('Barbenheimer') film releases dominate box office

2024.caption: Major elections worldwide (US, India, Mexico, UK, etc.)
Continued focus on AI development and regulation
Potential advancements in space exploration (Artemis program)
